description: An orphaned bird tags along with a flock on their long migration to Africa and becomes a hero when his newfound "family" runs into trouble.

title: Yes or No
description: Traditional girl Pie is initially uncomfortable with her tomboyish new roommate. But as time goes on, she finds herself increasingly attracted to her.

title: Yes or No 2
description: No longer university girls, Kim and Pie face new hurdles in their relationship, including work, new friends and other distractions.

title: Yes or No 2.5
description: Roommates Wine and Pie find their lives turned upside down when two more ladies move in next door, bringing up past heartaches and new attractions.

title: Yo-Kai Watch
description: Nate frees a mythical being trapped in a magic capsule, and the two new friends have adventures with all sorts of troublesome supernatural creatures.

title: Yo-Kai Watch: The Movie
description: Nate's special Yo-Kai Watch is missing. He travels back in time to meet the watch's inventor, his grandfather. Together, they must restore history!

title: Yoga Hosers
description: With an all-important high school party at stake, two teen yoga fanatics enlist a man hunter to help fight an army of monsters created by Nazis.

title: Yoko
description: Friends Mai, Oto and Vik's games at the park become magical adventures, thanks to Yoko, who can turn playgrounds into spaceships and camping sites.

title: Yoko and His Friends
description: Vik meets new friends in a new city, where they go on exciting adventures together with a magical being. But soon, his family must move again.

title: YOM
description: With the mind of a human being, and the body of whichever animal he chooses to be, a young boy protects the world from danger.

title: You Can Tutu
description: A gifted young ballet dancer struggles to find her footing in an uptight ballet school that brings her and her family to a brand-new neighborhood.

title: You Can’t Fight Christmas
description: After stepping in to revitalize his family's hotel, a money-minded businessman clashes with the hotel's cheery, Christmas-loving decorator.

title: You Carry Me
description: A soap opera producer, director and makeup artist each face wrenching family turmoil, from teen rebellion and marital infidelity to Alzheimer's.

title: You Changed My Life
description: Laida and Miggy think they've found perfect happiness with each other, until their burgeoning careers force them into a long-distance relationship.

title: You Don't Mess with the Zohan
description: An Israeli counterterrorism soldier with a secretly fabulous ambition to become a Manhattan hairstylist will do anything to make his dreams come true.

title: Young Adult
description: When a divorced writer gets a letter from an old boyfriend announcing his wife's had a baby, she returns to her hometown to reconnect with her ex.

title: Young Tiger
description: Aided only by a tough female police officer, a Hong Kong taxi driver tries to escape from gangsters pursuing incriminating evidence left in his cab.

title: Yours, Mine and Ours
description: When a father of eight and a mother of 10 prepare to wed, the couple's children attempt to sabotage the union in this remake of a 1968 comedy.

title: اشتباك
description: Amid the tumult following Egyptian President Morsi's ouster, demonstrators from divergent backgrounds are brought together inside a police truck.

title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Arc-V
description: Now that he's discovered the Pendulum Summoning technique, Yuya's dream of becoming the greatest "dueltainer" is in reach – but it won't be easy!

title: Yunus Emre
description: During the Mongol invasions, Yunus Emre leaves his home to travel across the Ottoman Empire, defying hardships and temptations to become a dervish.

title: Zak Storm
description: Teen surfer Zak Storm is mysteriously transported to the Bermuda Triangle, where he becomes the captain of a magical ship full of misfits.

title: Zed Plus
description: A philandering small-town mechanic's political ambitions are sparked when the visiting prime minister mistakenly grants him special security clearance.

title: Zenda
description: A change in the leadership of a political party sparks bitter conflict and the party's division into two rival factions.

title: Zindagi Gulzar Hai
description: Strong-willed, middle-class Kashaf and carefree, wealthy Zaroon meet in college, but before love can take root, they each have some growing up to do.

title: Zinzana
description: Recovering alcoholic Talal wakes up inside a small-town police station cell, where he's subject to the mind games of a psychotic sadist.

title: Zodiac
description: A political cartoonist, a crime reporter and a pair of cops investigate San Francisco's infamous Zodiac Killer in this thriller based on a true story.

title: Zombie Dumb
description: While living alone in a spooky town, a young girl befriends a motley crew of zombie children with diverse personalities.

title: Zombieland
description: Looking to survive in a world taken over by zombies, a dorky college student teams with an urban roughneck and a pair of grifter sisters.

title: Zoom
description: Dragged from civilian life, a former superhero must train a new crop of youthful saviors when the military preps for an attack by a familiar villain.

title: Zubaan
description: A scrappy but poor boy worms his way into a tycoon's dysfunctional family, while facing his fear of music and the truth about his past.
